resources.string:
Welcome to our ShoeStore application ! It is an honour.
We hope you Enjoy and make good use of it. Please, do not forget to give us your feedback. You can also rate the application on the store.

Enter the store and Enjoy adding your new shoes to the list. To Add new shoes, use the button "Add New Shoes" and Fill in the fields about the shoes such as Size and Company and color .. etc. After that , Press Add and Watch the new item listed in the store.
